stimulusHtml: The temporal character of Christo and Jeanne-Claudeâ€™s outdoor, site-specific installations, such as The Gates, was intended primarily to elicit which of the following responses from viewers?
choicesHtml: Appreciation for the ephemeral quality of their artworks
Religious reflection on the long process of artistic creation
Desire to extend the experience through the purchase of souvenirs
Inspire action against the rapid pace of environmental change
